snippet.textDisplay:
Yes, you can write the full app on your pc and publish from your friends Mac.
Corona has very detailed procedures on their website on the publishing process.  
Apple changes the procedures on a regular basis, but Corona Labs does a great job of keeping the process updated.
snippet.textOriginal:
Yes, you can write the full app on your pc and publish from your friends Mac.
Corona has very detailed procedures on their website on the publishing process.  
Apple changes the procedures on a regular basis, but Corona Labs does a great job of keeping the process updated.

snippet.textDisplay: Brian Burton so what if I make this Complete app on my Windows machine and then publish it through my friends mac I think I will just need an apple account would you explain what Is the procedure for publishing your app
snippet.textOriginal: Brian Burton so what if I make this Complete app on my Windows machine and then publish it through my friends mac I think I will just need an apple account would you explain what Is the procedure for publishing your app

snippet.textDisplay: It is an Apple requirement that iOS apps be published from a Mac.  You can fully build the app on a PC, but the final publish must be done from a Mac to be in compliance with Apple's contract that you sign.
snippet.textOriginal: It is an Apple requirement that iOS apps be published from a Mac.  You can fully build the app on a PC, but the final publish must be done from a Mac to be in compliance with Apple's contract that you sign.

snippet.textDisplay: Brian Burton can we make ios app from a Windows pc using corona or do we need a mac like x codes
snippet.textOriginal: Brian Burton can we make ios app from a Windows pc using corona or do we need a mac like x codes

snippet.textDisplay:
Hi Alan,
Android studio is a nice tool, but I can develop for iOS, Android, Mac, Windows, Ouya, etc with Corona much faster and easier, and at zero cost!
I liked Corona so much, that I started using it to teach my mobile app classes and eventually wrote a textbook for use with Corona.
snippet.textOriginal:
